home.no_projects: No projects yet. Create your first project using the area above.
home.no_results: No results found matching the filter.

upload.area_idle: Click or drag files to this area
upload.support_formats: Supports MP4, AVI, MOV, MKV, WebM formats
upload.subtitle_hint: Optionally import a subtitle file (.srt) or use AI automatic generation
upload.ai_subtitle_gen: AI speech recognition will be used to generate subtitles
upload.error_file_too_large: File too large, please select a smaller video file
upload.error_unsupported_format: Unsupported file format. Please select MP4, AVI, MOV, MKV, or WEBM
upload.error_bad_format_content: Problem with file format or content. Please check and try again
upload.error_server_processing: Server error processing file. Please try again later
upload.error_timeout: Upload timeout. Please check your network and try again
upload.error_network_suggest: If the problem persists, please check your network connection or contact support

bili.url_placeholder:
Please paste Bilibili or YouTube video link, supports:
• Bilibili: https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1xx411c7mu
• YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xxxxx
bili.project_placeholder: Leave blank to use video title as project name
bili.browser_hint: Selecting a browser allows access to login state for downloading AI subtitles. Without selection, only public subtitles can be downloaded.
bili.import_hint: {{platform}} project created successfully, downloading in background. You can continue adding other projects.
bili.invalid_url: Please enter a correct video link
bili.invalid_platform_url: Please enter a correct Bilibili or YouTube link

project.not_finished_desc: Wait for processing to complete to view clips and collections
project.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this project?
project.ai_collections_desc: AI has recommended {{count}} subject collections for you
project.video_clips_desc: AI has generated {{count}} wonderful clips for you

alert.multi_provider_desc: The system now supports multiple AI model providers, you can choose different providers and models as needed.

form.api_key_min: API key must be at least 10 characters

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.step1_desc: The system supports multiple AI model providers:
instructions.step2_desc:
• **Chunk Size**: Affects speed and accuracy, recommended 5000 chars
• **Score Threshold**: Only clips with score higher than this will be kept
• **Clips Count**: Controls the number of clips in each thematic collection
instructions.step3_desc: It is recommended to test if the API key is valid before saving to ensure the service works correctly

bilibili.title: Bilibili Account Management
bilibili.desc: Manage your Bilibili accounts, support for multi-account switching and fast posting
bilibili.feature_multi_account_desc: Support for adding multiple Bilibili accounts for easy management and switching
bilibili.feature_secure_login_desc: Use cookie import to avoid risk control, safe and reliable
bilibili.feature_fast_post_desc: Choose account to post directly on the clip detail page, simple operation
bilibili.feature_batch_manage_desc: Support for batch upload of multiple clips, improve efficiency

providers.dashscope: Alibaba Cloud Tongyi Qianwen large language model service
